name: swiftsim
description:
SPH With Inter-dependent Fine-grained Tasking (SWIFT) provides
astrophysicists with a state of the art framework to perform particle
based simulations.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
HPE MPI is HPE's implementation of the Message Passing Interface (MPI)
standard. Note: HPE MPI is proprietry software. Spack will search your
current directory for the download file. Alternatively, add this file to
a mirror so that Spack can find it. For instructions on how to set up a
mirror, see http://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html

dependencies.name: metis
dependencies.description:
METIS is a set of serial programs for partitioning graphs, partitioning
finite element meshes, and producing fill reducing orderings for sparse
matrices. The algorithms implemented in METIS are based on the
multilevel recursive-bisection, multilevel k-way, and multi-constraint
partitioning schemes.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.
